name: retrievepornstar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool papi_pornstarsapi.
Tool description: Trying to be the most comprehensive and accurate source of data for pornstars and movies.
API description: Retrieve information about a specific pornstar based on the given criteria.

is_id.description: A unique integer value identifying this pornstar.

min_weight.description: The minimum weight of the pornstar.

max_cup_size.description: The maximum cup size of the pornstar.

min_waist.description: The minimum waist size of the pornstar.

hair.description: The hair color of the pornstar.

max_age.description: The maximum age of the pornstar.

min_age.description: The minimum age of the pornstar.

min_cup_size.description: The minimum cup size of the pornstar.

date_of_birth.description: The birth date of the pornstar.

eyes.description: The eye color of the pornstar.

max_waist.description: The maximum waist size of the pornstar.

max_weight.description: The maximum weight of the pornstar.
